entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 12:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 11:31 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:31 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
